channel.title: Um, help please
channel.description:
:confused: :mad: PROBLEM :mad: :confused:
Once I open the client, it loads about -23% of "game loading" then seems to shut down and dissapears, leaving me only with the bot window open saying "press any key", I press a key and that shuts down also. I've been searching numerous web-sites on help for this type of query and yet have not found a single person with the same problem. Also when I try to open the compile-scripts I recieve the phrase: " "Javac" is not recognized ".
I am well and truly stuck at this moment. I have downloaded the "moparscape 3.2 version" and am assuming I have alredy got the latest Java ( will try to download once again ).
I would appreciate any helpful advice towards this problem greatly, if you guys wouldn't mind helping me.
Thank You :eek: HMMPH :eek:

item.title: Um, help please
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

try reinstalling the latest java (update 10) and redownload moparscape

Read full topic

item.title: Um, help please

item.description:
@queenz98 wrote:

yea i got the same prob. i downloaded morparscape but it doesnt seem to work. it loads for lyk 2% and when i click to open the window bcoz i minimized it, it just closes down. WHY? anyone knows please help!
